job_description:
Insight Global is looking for a Software Test Engineer to join one of the top software companies in North America. This individual will help develop test automation to support their SaaS platform of Security and Quality software testing tools. The position entails designing, developing, and maintaining testing infrastructure, in support of their agile SDLC, as well as writing and automating end-to-end test plans for continuous feature acceptance.
Must Haves:
* 3+ years professional experience developing automated tests against a SaaS application hosted in GCP, AWS or Azure
* Experience implementing chaos, resiliency, SaaS infrastructure and region testing
* Implemented tools for monitoring service health, alerting, metrics using of production-level monitoring systems such as DataDog
* Strong Java programming skills as well as experience working with shell scripts.
* Experience developing interface boundary and functional tests for common protocols such as REST, gRPC and RabbitMQ
* Strong test and bug investigation, debugging and reporting skills
* Expertise developing tests in a Docker and Kubernetes environment as well the infrastructure to support them
* Experience with industry standard automation and development tools (JIRA, Jenkins, Git, Docker, JMeter, SoapUI, etc.)
* Common testing experience in: SQL Databases, SSO, OAUTH2, OpenID, or SAML and RBAC functionality
* Strong working network, security, Linux system administration, and troubleshooting skills
Plusses:
* Understand backwards compatibility testing techniques
* Working understanding of ease-of-use, usability and UX testing
* Familiarity with security testing principles including penetration testing
* Experience integrating a contract testing framework in a distributed enterprise environment
* Python with Flask experience
